Title: Le Deuxieme Souffle
Writer: José Giovanni (novel), José Giovanni (dialogue), Jean-Pierre Melville (dialogue), Jean-Pierre Melville (adaptation)
Actors: Lino Ventura, Paul Meurisse, Raymond Pellegrin, Christine Fabréga
Plot: Gustave Minda, better known as Gu, a dangerous gangster, escapes from jail. He goes to Paris to join Manouche and other friends, and get involved in a gangland killing. Before leaving the ...
